You finish looting.

“Eunoia, c'mon.” Aelriss says. “You can see her again later.”

Eunoia returns to Aelriss's shoulder, and the other bird flutters up and out of the cave, whistling a grave sounding melody and leaving a sparkling trail in its wake.

You light the dead player's torch and throw it over the side. It's a good drop. You'd wager about thirty feet, before what looks like an uneven stone surface dotted with the bones of unknown creatures. You think you see something scatter into the darkness below.

> Nope!
> Cannonball!
> Use exploring gear to make a way down.
> Other
